description:
Protect your baby in transport. This all-bells, all-whistles bike travel bag features a hard plastic base, polyethylene board–reinforced top and sides, and stiffener rods for maximum impact defense. Side stabilizer rods over the wheel compartments distribute pressure across the exterior to safeguard your rims, spokes and disc brakes. Smooth skate wheels and a clip-on third wheel let you traverse airports without breaking a sweat. When you arrive at your destination, remove the stiffener rods for compact storage.

  • Made of strong, abrasion-resistant 600-denier polyester
  • 10mm foam padding with polyethylene panels for crush resistance at key areas, and a hard plastic undercarriage for stability
  • Pad supports the chain stay and protects drive train, the fork gets a cinch-down pocket, a pad wraps the top tube and down tube, with additional pads for the seat post, handlebars and frame
  • 3 zippered internal pockets for pedals, quick-release skewers and tools
  • 2 zippered exterior pockets hold bike wheels up to 29in. with tires up to 2.6in. wide. Both have integrated disc brake protection
  • Webbing grab handles for easy handling
  • Zippers are lockable
  • Business card pocket on exterior for easy luggage ID
  • Integrated aluminum pull handle
  • Collapsed dimensions are 135 x 38 x 30cm
  • Fits most road, gravel, triathlon, cross-country, all-mountain, enduro and freeride bikes with a maximum wheelbase of 130cm
  • To safely transport road and triathlon bikes, you'll need to use the included road bike aluminum stand
name: EVOC Bike Travel Bag Pro
